GET /radar/attacks/layer7/summary/http_m.description: Retrieves the distribution of layer 7 attacks by HTTP method.

parameters.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.
parameters.name: name

schema.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.

parameters.description: Filters results by the specified date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).
parameters.name: dateRange

schema.description: Filters results by the specified date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

parameters.description: Start of the date range.
parameters.name: dateStart

schema.description: Start of the date range.

parameters.description: End of the date range (inclusive).
parameters.name: dateEnd

schema.description: End of the date range (inclusive).

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs). Prefix with `-` to exclude ASNs from results. For example, `-174, 3356` excludes results from AS174, but includes results from AS3356.
parameters.name: asn

schema.description: Comma-separated list of Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs). Prefix with `-` to exclude ASNs from results. For example, `-174, 3356` excludes results from AS174, but includes results from AS3356.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of locations (alpha-2 codes). Prefix with `-` to exclude locations from results. For example, `-US,PT` excludes results from the US, but includes results from PT.
parameters.name: location

schema.description: Comma-separated list of locations (alpha-2 codes). Prefix with `-` to exclude locations from results. For example, `-US,PT` excludes results from the US, but includes results from PT.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of continents (alpha-2 continent codes). Prefix with `-` to exclude continents from results. For example, `-EU,NA` excludes results from EU, but includes results from NA.
parameters.name: continent

schema.description: Comma-separated list of continents (alpha-2 continent codes). Prefix with `-` to exclude continents from results. For example, `-EU,NA` excludes results from EU, but includes results from NA.

parameters.description: Filters results by IP version (Ipv4 vs. IPv6).
parameters.name: ipVersion

schema.description: Filters results by IP version (Ipv4 vs. IPv6).

parameters.description: Filters results by HTTP version.
parameters.name: httpVersion

schema.description: Filters results by HTTP version.

parameters.description: Array of L7 mitigation products.
parameters.name: mitigationProduct

schema.description: Array of L7 mitigation products.

parameters.description: Limits the number of objects per group to the top items within the specified time range. If there are more items than the limit, the response will include the count of items, with any remaining items grouped together under an "other" category.
parameters.name: limitPerGroup

schema.description: Limits the number of objects per group to the top items within the specified time range. If there are more items than the limit, the response will include the count of items, with any remaining items grouped together under an "other" category.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

GET /radar/attacks/layer7/top/ases/origi.summary: Get top origin ASes of layer 7 attacks

GET /radar/attacks/layer7/top/attacks.description: Retrieves the top attacks from origin to target location. Values are percentages of the total layer 7 attacks (with billing country). The attack magnitude can be defined by the number of mitigated requests or by the number of zones affected. You can optionally limit the number of attacks by origin/target location (useful if all the top attacks are from or to the same location).
